The Element of Statistical Learning
============================================



.. admonition:: Reference Books
   :class: note


   1. `The Elements of Statistical Learning <https://statweb.stanford.edu/~tibs/ElemStatLearn/printings/ESLII_print10.pdf>`_ by Trevor Hastie, Robert Tibshirani, and Jerome Friedman.
